languages.text: "Костяк сил {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} отбыл на границы сектора для борьбы с ксеноугрозой. От них давно уже нет вестей, впрочем, учитывая расстояние и нынешние проблемы с астропатами, это не так уж необычно".

"The core of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} forces in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."
languages.original_text: "Костяк сил {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} отбыл на границы сектора для борьбы с ксеноугрозой. От них давно уже нет вестей, впрочем, учитывая расстояние и нынешние проблемы с астропатами, это не так уж необычно".

traits.locale_text: "The core of the Imperial forces in the Expanse has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

"The core of the Imperial forces in the Expanse has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}軍の中核は、異種族の脅威と戦うために星域の境界線に向けて出発した。しばらく連絡はないが、距離や感応通信官の今ある問題を考えれば、まるっきり異常というわけでもない」
languages.original_text: "The core of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} forces in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}軍の中核は、異種族の脅威と戦うために星域の境界線に向けて出発した。しばらく連絡はないが、距離や感応通信官の今ある問題を考えれば、まるっきり異常というわけでもない」

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}驻扎在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的核心部队，已经出发前往扩区边缘，对抗异形威胁。我们已经有很久一阵子没收到过他们的消息了。不过，考虑到扩区边缘到这里的距离，以及目前星语通讯受到的干扰，这样的情况完全正常。”
languages.original_text: "The core of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} forces in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}驻扎在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的核心部队，已经出发前往扩区边缘，对抗异形威胁。我们已经有很久一阵子没收到过他们的消息了。不过，考虑到扩区边缘到这里的距离，以及目前星语通讯受到的干扰，这样的情况完全正常。”

languages.text: «El grueso de las fuerzas del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} ha partido hacia las fronteras del sector para combatir la amenaza que entrañan los xenos. Hace tiempo que no se sabe nada de ellos, aunque entre la distancia y los problemas actuales con los astrópatas... me parece normal y todo».
languages.original_text: "The core of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} forces in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

traits.locale_text: «El grueso de las fuerzas del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} ha partido hacia las fronteras del sector para combatir la amenaza que entrañan los xenos. Hace tiempo que no se sabe nada de ellos, aunque entre la distancia y los problemas actuales con los astrópatas... me parece normal y todo».

languages.text: « Le gros des forces de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} s'est rendu aux frontières du secteur afin d'y combattre la menace xénos. Voilà déjà quelque temps que nous n'avons pas reçu de nouvelles... mais entre la distance et les problèmes actuels avec les astropathes, ça n'a rien d'extraordinaire. »
languages.original_text: "The core of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} forces in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

traits.locale_text: « Le gros des forces de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} s'est rendu aux frontières du secteur afin d'y combattre la menace xénos. Voilà déjà quelque temps que nous n'avons pas reçu de nouvelles... mais entre la distance et les problèmes actuels avec les astropathes, ça n'a rien d'extraordinaire. »

languages.text: "Der Kern der {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}imperialen{/g} Truppen in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} ist unterwegs zu den Grenzen des Sektors, um die Xenos-Bedrohung zu bekämpfen. Wir haben nun schon eine ganze Weile nichts mehr von ihnen gehört – andererseits ist das wegen der Distanz und den aktuellen Problemen mit Astropathen auch nicht wirklich außergewöhnlich."
languages.original_text: "The core of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} forces in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

traits.locale_text: "Der Kern der {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}imperialen{/g} Truppen in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} ist unterwegs zu den Grenzen des Sektors, um die Xenos-Bedrohung zu bekämpfen. Wir haben nun schon eine ganze Weile nichts mehr von ihnen gehört – andererseits ist das wegen der Distanz und den aktuellen Problemen mit Astropathen auch nicht wirklich außergewöhnlich."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ndeki{/g} ana güçleri, zeno tehdidiyle mücadele etmek için sektör sınırlarına sevk edildi. Bir süredir haber alınamıyor. Gerçi mesafe ve Astropatların yaşadığı mevcut sorunlar hesaba katıldığında çok da olağan dışı değil."
languages.original_text: "The core of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} forces in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} has departed for the sector's borders to combat the xenos threat. There has been no word from them for a while now — then again, with the distance and the current issues with Astropaths, that is not entirely out of the ordinary."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ndeki ana güçleri, zeno tehdidiyle mücadele etmek için sektör sınırlarına sevk edildi. Bir süredir haber alınamıyor. Gerçi mesafe ve Astropatların yaşadığı mevcut sorunlar hesaba katıldığında çok da olağan dışı değil."
